exercise.instructions:
Another important element in a programming language is the use of comments. A comment helps the developer to document his implementation. A commented code should be clear and maintainable.
In Python we use '#' at the beginning of a line, in order to comment out a single line of code.
exercise.code: def printNameWithComment(name): #enter your comment here print #enter your code here return

task.content: Add a comment to describe your implementation.
